text: CLOSE ` ` Saturday Night Live'' got right back to hot - button politics in its second episode of the season. Wochit Kanye West has disappeared from social media, again. After a peculiar week that included a pro - Trump rant and head - scratching tweets about abolishing the constititutional amendment that prohibits slavery, the rapper has apparently shut down his Twitter and Instagram accounts. USA TODAY has reached out to West's representative for comment. It isn't the first time that West, 41, who also announced that he was changing his name to ` ` Ye,'' has opted out of social media.
